data.name: Sample - BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Create Account in Vault
workflows.description: Creates an account in BeyondTrust vault.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Create Account in Vault

workflows.name: Get User List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of users from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like user name, email ID, security provider ID and any other details you have specified.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Get User List

workflows.name: Create Vendor Group
workflows.description: Creates a vendor group in BeyondTrust based specified input parameters.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Create Vendor Group

workflows.name: Remove User from Vendor Group
workflows.description: Removes user from a vendor group based on the user ID and vendor group ID you have specified.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Remove User from Vendor Group

routes.name: Start-> Remove User from Vendor Group

workflows.name: Get User List in Vendor Group
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of users in a vendor group based on the filter criteria like vendor group id and any other details you have specified.

steps.name: Get User List in Vendor Group

arguments.name: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access
arguments.operationTitle: Get User List in Vendor Group

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Get User List in Vendor Group

routes.name: Start-> Get User List in Vendor Group

workflows.name: Create User in Vendor Group
workflows.description: Creates a user in a vendor group based on the input parameters specified.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Create User in Vendor Group

routes.name: Start-> Create User in Vendor Group

workflows.name: Delete Vendor Group
workflows.description: Deletes a specific vendor group from BeyondTrust.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Delete Vendor Group

workflows.name: Delete Account From Vault
workflows.description: Deletes a accounts from vault in BeyondTrust. Note: This action cannot delete personal account.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Delete Account From Vault

workflows.name: Get Vault Account Policy List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of account policies from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Get Vault Account Policy List

routes.name: Start-> Get Vault Account Policy List

workflows.name: Get Account List From Vault
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of accounts from vault in BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name, type, account group, and any other details you have specified.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Get Account List From Vault

routes.name: Start-> Get Account List From Vault

workflows.name: Get Group Policy List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of group policies from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Get Group Policy List

workflows.name: Get Vault Endpoint List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of vault endpoints from vault in BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name, hostname, domain name and any other details you have specified.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Get Vault Endpoint List

workflows.name: Get User Details in Vendor Group
workflows.description: Retrieves details of user in a vendor group based on the user ID and vendor group ID you have specified.

steps.name: Get User Details in Vendor Group

arguments.name: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access
arguments.operationTitle: Get User Details in Vendor Group

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Get User Details in Vendor Group

routes.name: Start-> Get User Details in Vendor Group

workflows.name: Checkin or Checkout Credentials From Vault
workflows.description: Checkin or checkout private key or password From Vault in BeyondTrust.

workflows.name: Update Vendor Group
workflows.description: Updates a vendor group in BeyondTrust based specified input parameters.

arguments.title: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access: Update Vendor Group

workflows.name: Get Vendor Group Details
workflows.description: Retrieves vendor group details based on specified Vendor Group ID from BeyondTrust.

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of account groups from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.
